text.div:
Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition HIVCPrEPvisit

Profiles: CRMI Shareable StructureDefinition, CRMI Publishable StructureDefinition

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
HIVCPrEPvisit 0..*BaseHIV.C PrEP visit
Instances of this logical model can be the target of a Reference
reasonForPrepVisit 1..1CodingReason for PrEP visit
Binding: Reason for PrEP visit ValueSet (required)
threeMonthPrepVisit 0..1boolean3-month PrEP visit
contactWithAndSuspectedExposureToHiv 0..1booleanContact with and (suspected) exposure to HIV
dateTimeOfSuspectedExposureToHiv 0..1dateTimeDate/time of suspected exposure to HIV
currentlyOnPrep 0..1booleanCurrently on PrEP
prepDosingType 0..1CodingPrEP dosing type
Binding: PrEP dosing type ValueSet (required)
otherPrepDosingTypeSpecify 0..1stringOther PrEP dosing type (specify)
usedEventDrivenPrepForAtRiskExposuresOverThePast3Months 0..1booleanUsed event-driven PrEP for at risk exposures over the past 3 months
currentPrepRegimen 0..1CodingCurrent PrEP regimen
Binding: Current PrEP regimen ValueSet (required)
experienceWithPrep 0..1CodingExperience with PrEP
Binding: Experience with PrEP ValueSet (required)
prepStartDate 0..1datePrEP start date
stoppedPrep 0..1booleanStopped PrEP
datePrepStopped 0..1dateDate PrEP stopped
pepHistory 0..1CodingPEP history
Binding: PEP history ValueSet (required)
datesOfPastPepUse 0..1dateDate(s) of past PEP use
dateClientCompletesPepCourse 0..1dateDate client completes PEP course
signsOfSubstantialRiskOfHivInfection 1..*CodingSigns of substantial risk of HIV infection
Binding: Signs of substantial risk of HIV infection ValueSet (required)
pregnancyIntentionInSerodiscordantPartnerships 1..1CodingPregnancy intention in serodiscordant partnerships
Binding: Pregnancy intention in serodiscordant partnerships ValueSet (required)
acuteHivInfectionSymptoms 0..*CodingAcute HIV infection symptoms
Binding: Acute HIV infection symptoms ValueSet (required)
sexPartnerHivTreatmentStatus 0..*CodingSex partner's HIV treatment status
Binding: Sex partner's HIV treatment status ValueSet (required)
suitableForPrep 0..1booleanSuitable for PrEP
offeredPrep 0..1booleanOffered PrEP
screeningsAndDiagnosticsForPrepUsers 0..*CodingScreenings and diagnostics for PrEP users
Binding: Screenings and diagnostics for PrEP users ValueSet (required)
serumCreatinineTestDate 0..1dateSerum creatinine test date
serumCreatinineTestResult 0..1integerSerum creatinine test result
dateMedicationsDispensed 0..1dateDate medications dispensed
dateMedicationsPrescribed 0..1dateDate medications prescribed
medicationsPrescribed 0..1CodingMedications prescribed
Binding: Medications prescribed ValueSet (required)
otherMedicationsPrescribed 0..1stringOther (specify)
prepProductPrescribed 0..1CodingPrEP product prescribed
Binding: PrEP product prescribed ValueSet (required)
otherPrepProductPrescribed 0..1stringOther (specify)
datePrepPrescribed 0..1dateDate PrEP prescribed
datePrepDispensed 0..1dateDate PrEP dispensed
volumeOfPrepProductPrescribedDispensed 0..1integerVolume of PrEP product prescribed/dispensed
datePepPrescribed 0..1dateDate PEP prescribed
datePepCourseCompletion 0..1dateDate PEP course completion
preferredPepBackboneRegimen 0..1CodingPreferred PEP backbone regimen
Binding: Preferred PEP backbone regimen ValueSet (required)
alternativePepBackboneRegimen 0..*CodingAlternative PEP backbone regimen
Binding: Alternative PEP backbone regimen ValueSet (required)
preferredThirdPepDrug 0..*CodingPreferred third PEP drug
Binding: Preferred third PEP drug ValueSet (required)
alternativeThirdPepDrug 0..*CodingAlternative third PEP drug
Binding: Alternative third PEP drug ValueSet (required)
estimatedCreatinineClearance 0..1integerEstimated creatinine clearance
sexFactorForEstimatingCreatinineClearance 0..1CodingSex factor for estimating creatinine clearance
Binding: Sex factor for estimating creatinine clearance ValueSet (required)
estimatedCreatinineClearanceCockcroftGaultEquation 0..1integerEstimated creatinine clearance (CockcroftGault equation)
dateOfSampleCollection 0..1dateTimeDate of sample collection
contraindicationsToPrepUsage 0..*CodingContraindications to PrEP usage
Binding: Contraindications to PrEP usage ValueSet (required)
otherAllergyOrContraindicationToAMedicineInThePrepRegimenSpecify 0..1stringOther allergy or contraindication to a medicine in the PrEP regimen (specify)
prescribedPrepAtInitialVisit 0..1booleanPrescribed PrEP at initial visit
numberOfDaysPrescribed 0..1integerNumber of days prescribed
prepRegimenPrescribed 0..*CodingPrEP regimen prescribed
Binding: PrEP regimen prescribed ValueSet (required)
adherenceCounsellingProvided 0..1booleanAdherence counselling provided
dateTimeOfFollowUpAppointment 0..1dateTimeDate/time of follow-up appointment
typeOfFollowUpAppointment 0..1CodingType of follow-up appointment
Binding: Type of follow-up appointment ValueSet (required)
otherTypeOfFollowUpAppointment 0..1stringOther (specify)
linkedToEnrolmentInCareAndArtInitiation 0..1booleanLinked to enrolment in care and ART initiation
preventionServicesOfferedAndReferrals 0..*CodingPrevention services offered and referrals
Binding: Prevention services offered and referrals ValueSet (required)
dateProvidedCondoms 0..1dateDate provided condoms
condomsDistributed 0..1integerCondoms distributed
condomType 0..1CodingCondom type
Binding: Condom type ValueSet (required)
hivSelfTestKitsAccepted 0..1booleanHIV self-test kits accepted
numberOfHivSelfTestKitsDistributed 0..1integerNumber of HIV self-test kits distributed
hivSelfTestDistributedForUseBy 0..1CodingHIV self-test distributed for use by
Binding: HIV self-test distributed for use by ValueSet (required)
sexualAndReproductiveHealthIntegratedServices 0..*CodingSexual and reproductive health integrated services
Binding: Sexual and reproductive health integrated services ValueSet (required)
offerOtherClinicalServices 0..*CodingOffer other clinical services
Binding: Offer other clinical services ValueSet (required)
otherSupportServices 0..*CodingOther support services
Binding: Other support services ValueSet (required)

Documentation for this format

name: HIVCPrEPvisit
title: HIV.C PrEP visit
description: This tab describes the data that may be collected during the pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) or post-exposure prophylaxis (PEP) workflow (HIV.C)

element.definition: This tab describes the data that may be collected during the pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) or post-exposure prophylaxis (PEP) workflow (HIV.C)
Client's reason for the prevention visit
Client is visiting for the recommended 3-month pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) visit

element.short: Contact with and (suspected) exposure to HIV
element.definition: The client had suspected or known exposure to HIV

element.short: Date/time of suspected exposure to HIV
element.definition: When the suspect exposure to HIV took place
The client is currently taking PrEP. Oral pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) of HIV is the use of ARV drugs by people who are not infected with HIV to block the acquisition of HIV.
Way in which pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) is taken (daily or event-driven)
Other PrEP dosing type (specify)

element.short: Used event-driven PrEP for at risk exposures over the past 3 months
element.definition: Client reports taking ED-PrEP for at risk exposures over a 3-month period
HIV pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) regimen
The client's experience in taking PrEP
The date on which the client started or restarted pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP)
Client stopped taking pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP)
Date client stopped taking pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP)
The client's history in taking post-exposure prophylaxis (PEP) for HIV prevention
Dates when the client previously used post-exposure prophylaxis (PEP)
Date client completes PEP course

element.short: Signs of substantial risk of HIV infection
element.definition: Signs the client is at a substantial risk of HIV infection
Client's intention or desire in the next year to either become pregnant or prevent a future pregnancy (in serodiscordant partnerships)
Symptoms that could suggest an acute HIV infection
Treatment adherence of client's sex partner for partners that are HIV-positive
The client is suitable for PrEP
After being evaluated as suitable for PrEP, the client was offered PrEP

element.short: Screenings and diagnostics for PrEP users
element.definition: Listing of tests for clients on or starting pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) that may be recommended or should be considered
Test serum creatinine to identify pre-existing renal disease (estimated creatinine clearance less than 60 ml/min)
Test serum creatinine to identify pre-existing renal disease (estimated creatinine clearance less than 60 ml/min).
Date the client was dispensed medications
Date the client was prescribed medications
Medications the client was prescribed
Client was prescribed other medications (specify)
PrEP product that the client was prescribed
Client was prescribed other PrEP product (specify)
Date client was prescribed PrEP, including initial prescription and repeats
Date client was dispensed PrEP
Volume of PrEP product the client was prescribed or dispensed (for example, number of pills, number of devices)
Date the client was prescribed PEP
Date client completes PEP course
Preferred backbone regimen for PEP
Alternative backbone regimen for PEP
Preferred third drug for PEP
Alternative third drug for PEP
Estimated creatinine clearance of the client returned from lab in mL/min

element.short: Sex factor for estimating creatinine clearance
element.definition: Value used for gender for calculating creatinine clearance if required. For transgender populations, the sex at birth is used in the Cockcroft-Gault equation if the person is not using hormone therapy; among transgender populations using hormone therapy for more than three months, the current gender can be used.

If the laboratory does not have the capacity to estimate creatinine clearance, the provider can use the CockcroftGault equation to calculate estimated creatinine clearance based on measured serum creatinine, the clients sex at birth, age and estimated lean body weight.
Date when the specimen was collected
Listing of contraindications to pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP)

element.short: Other allergy or contraindication to a medicine in the PrEP regimen (specify)
element.definition: Client has another allergy or contraindication to a medicine in the pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) regimen (specify)
Client was prescribed pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) on a first visit
Days of medication client has been prescribed
HIV pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) regimen prescribed
Whether adherence counselling was provided
Date the client is to return for monitoring, re-supply, or any other reason
Type of follow-up appointment for testing services
Other reason for the follow-up appointment (specify)

element.short: Linked to enrolment in care and ART initiation
element.definition: Linkage made from HIV testing to enrolment in care following an HIV diagnosis
Offer or refer to prevention services
Date client was provided with condoms
Number of condoms given to the client, if any were distributed
Type of condom provided to client
Whether any HIV self-test kits were given to the client

element.short: Number of HIV self-test kits distributed
element.definition: Number of HIV self-test kits distributed to the client

element.short: HIV self-test distributed for use by
element.definition: Whom the client plans to give the HIV self-test kit (self, sexual partner, social contact, etc.)

element.short: Sexual and reproductive health integrated services
element.definition: Offer or refer to sexual and reproductive health services
Other clinical services offered or referrals given to the client
Offer or refer for other support services
